units.title: Aggregate formation cell seeding
units.text: 2 × 105 cells per mL on 6-well low-attachment plate 50 μM Y27632
units.rationale: Establishes the initial cell density and survival support for aggregate formation.

units.title: Mesoderm induction
units.rationale: Activates WNT and BMP pathways to drive hPSCs toward mesodermal fate.

units.title: Vascular lineage induction
units.rationale: Stimulates endothelial and pericyte differentiation from mesodermal progenitors.

units.title: Embedding and vessel sprouting
units.text: Vessel sprouting d5 into collagen I–Matrigel matrix (12-well plate) 100 ng/mL VEGF-A, 100 ng/mL FGF-2, 15% FBS
units.rationale: Provides a 3D matrix and growth factors for vascular network formation.

units.title: Wash hPSCs with EDTA
units.text: Wash hPSCs with 0.5 mM EDTA by removing E8 medium and replacing it with 0.6 mL of 0.5 mM EDTA per well of a 6-well plate.
units.rationale: Cleanses cells and prepares them for enzymatic dissociation.

units.title: Accutase dissociation
units.text: Aspirate the EDTA solution, add 0.6 mL of Accutase per well and incubate for 3–5 min at 37 °C.
units.rationale: Gently detaches cells to obtain a single‑cell suspension.

units.title: Resuspend cells in aggregation medium
units.text: Resuspend the cells in 5 mL of aggregation medium using a 5-mL serological pipette and collect the cells in a 15-mL Falcon tube.
units.rationale: Places cells in defined medium for subsequent aggregate formation.

units.title: Incubate aggregates in low-attachment plate
units.text: Place 3 mL of cell suspension per well into a 6-well low-attachment plate and incubate for 1 d until cell aggregates with smooth borders (>50- to 100-µm diameter) have been formed (Fig. 2b).
units.rationale: Allows cells to self‑assemble into uniform aggregates.

units.title: Add prewarmed differentiation medium
units.text: Add prewarmed (37 °C) StemPro-34 SFM complete medium including 15% FBS, 100 ng/mL VEGF-A and 100 ng/mL FGF-2 to induce blood vessel differentiation.
units.rationale: Provides nutrients and angiogenic cues for vascular network development.

units.title: Transplant organoids into kidney capsule
units.text: Transplant blood vessel organoids into the kidney capsule of immunocompromised mice as previously described37.
units.rationale: Enables in vivo integration and functional assessment of the organoids.
